Bandwidth-Limiting
This section describes how to set up your Linux server to limit download bandwidth or incoming traffic and how to use your internet link more efficiently. It is meant to provide an easy solution for limiting incoming traffic, thus preventing our LAN users from consuming all the bandwidth of our internet link. This is useful when our internet link is slow or our LAN users download tons of mp3s and the newest Linux distro's *.iso files.
* Bandwidth Limiting HOWTO
